sect1.title: General
sect1.para: The Crc32_Mng_CrcEth get the request from CRC Manager, the Crc32_Mng_CrcEth send the hash calculate request to EthSwt based on request&switch status or requests the response from the ethernet switch hash request. Get the Hashrequest response from the EthSwt calculate the CRC32 from Hash if the status is completed and send it to the CRC Manager
